ManufacturingProgram.name: ManufacturingProgram
ManufacturingProgram.description: Represents information about a manufacturing program. For example, Verican X program for Verican Account to manufacture auto components for their upcoming concept vehicle, staring from 01-Jan-2022 and valid until 01-Dec-2024.

AccountId.description: The account for which the manufacturing program is created.

Description.description: The description of the manufacturing program.

EndDate.description: The end date of the manufacturing program.

ExternalName.description: The name used for the manufacturing program by external organizations.

ManufacturingProgramTemplateId.description: The template used for the manufacturing program.

Name.description: The name of the manufacturing program record.

ProgramType.description: Specifies the type of manufacturing program.

RelatedManufacturingProgramId.description: Another manufacturing program associated with the manufacturing program.

StartDate.description: The start date of the manufacturing program.

Status.description: Specifies the status of the manufacturing program.
